Welcome to

Smart Shib

The Smartest of the Shib Tokens!

Buy now

Set Slippage to 12%

What is Smart Shib Token?

Smart Shib is a decentralized community driven token on the Binance Smart Chain. This innovative protocol contains the most carefully thought out tokenomics available today.

Smart Shib was created by an experienced business management team that has the knowledge necessary to maintain the smart contract while keeping Smart Shib holders as our top priority. During development of Smart Shib our team focused on creating a safe and transparent contract to benefit the BSC community.

The Smart Shib team made sure to address issues that are commonly found in smart contracts to help restore faith in BSC token investing. Our dedicated management team coupled with a motivated community assures long term organic growth and benefits to Smart Shib holders.

Smart Shib

The New Meme

Phenomenon

Smart Shib Token is fully  decentralized.

Telegram

This is the Dawn of a New Era of Meme Coins!

In this new world of meme tokens, Smart Shib stands out among the rest and already has a proven track record of steady organic growth. Over the first two months we’ve earned community trust and continue on our path upward.

View Live Chart

This idea will hit like the tailed beast ball

BabyDeer Coin’s epic cuteness and foundation in lore will destroy all of the competition. Afterall he is the strongest tailed beast.

View all Features

Why Choose Smart Shib Token?

The Smart Shib Token contract is verified and 100% of LP tokens have been burned which means no one can ever access the liquidity pool.

Return

Smart Shib's Vision

Community Focused

Our dedicated community is seen as a key member of our team and is involved in every step along the way.

Dedicated Management

We take our roadmap very seriously. Smart Shib is focused on advanced development and delivering for our holders.

Stealth Launch

Smart Shib was released to the public after a one week social media campaign with no pre-sale. This gave every investor a fair chance to get in on the ground floor.

Roadmap

Don't Miss Out On Smart Shib Token!

Buy on Smart Swap

1. Install Trust wallet

Install Trust Wallet on your phone or desktop and follow instructions carefully to create your Smart Chain wallet.

2. Deposit BNB to Trust Wallet

After successfully creating your wallet, purchase Smart Chain BNB by highlighting BNB and pressing the “buy” button. Purchase desired amount of BNB via debit card or bank account. BNB is the currency of the Binance Smart Chain and is necessary for purchases and transaction fees.
 

3. Connect to Smart Swap Dex

Connect your wallet to Smart Swap Dex (https://smartswapdex.com/) on your phone or desktop (same device as wallet) on your web browser go to https://smartswapdex.com/ and click “connect wallet.”  

4. Exchange BNB for Smart Shib

On Smart Swap Dex set slippage to 12% in the option menu. Now you can swap BNB for Smart Shib ($SMART). Once you’ve completed your swap follow the instructions below to view Smart Shib in your wallet.

Contribute to Your Success

Join the Community

Smart Contract Audit

Smart Shib has already passed several free audits. A full paid Techrate audit is coming soon.

NFT

Smart Shib's management team and community have a passion for art and the future of the NFT space.
One of the top priorities for Smart Shib is the addition of smART NFT minting.

Holder Rewards

Our Management team will continue to work with the community to develop new rewards systems to benefit Smart Shib holders. Currently, top shillers are rewarded with airdrops, voting abilities, and admin rights on Telegram.

Exchanges

After significant growth on Pancake Swap and other token swaps, we will list on large centralized exchanges that honor Smart Shib’s tokenomics and trade in  high volumes.

Join our welcoming community and be part of the team. We encourage all holders to  jump on board and help spread the word about Smart Shib. With the power of our dedicated team and loyal holders Smart Shib can compete with any of the top tokens on the market. Let’s go!!!

White Paper

Smart Shib Protocol is a deflationary, rewards based, community driven token on the BSC network. The Smart Shib team developed our smart contract to be transparent and easily identified as safe and anti-scam. During development the team focused on providing a contract without any of the safety issues commonly found in other smart contracts. After adding liquidity 100% of the LP  tokens were sent to the BSC burn address. This way investors do not need to rely on trust, they can verify saftey. The tokenomics were carefully designed to benefit the holders above all. With each transaction (buy, sell, transfer) there is a 9% tax 4% of tokens are redistributed to all wallets holding Smart Shib, 4% is converted to BNB and automatically added to the Pancake swap liquidity pool to ensure smooth trading and 1% is sent to the marketing and product development wallet. The philosophy behind Smart Shib is to grow organically in a way that benefits holders with a management team that will only make SMART decisions for the investors. Smart Shib is purposely different in many ways. Not only do we provide passive income by holding, we also provide a fun, friendly community with token investment education and provide tools for the community so they to know what to look for when investing as well as 24/7 customer service. Before launch we minted 1 quadrillion (1000 trillion) then right after launch sent 1/2 (500 trillion) to the BSC burn address. No additional minting is possible. Current circulating supply is 480 trillion after a 20 trillion burning of the developer wallet. Smart Shib has a long term plan to be in position to benefit from the soon to come mass-adoption of blockchain technology. Smart Swap Dex is one of the products we are currently developing and will and will be released this year. The management team is currently planning the development of smart NFT minting platform to be released in the first quarter of 2022.
